name: 戦国無双4-II オリジナルサウンドトラック
summary:
Comes with the Japanese Treasure Box version of the game.
PlayStation 4 (KTGS-40284)、PlayStation 3 (KTGS-30283)、PlayStation Vita (KTGS-V0285)


Staff

Compose:
Yojiro Yoshimatsu (M1 / M12 / M13)
Junya Ishiguro (M5 / M6 / M9 / M11)
Kosuke Mizukami (M7 / M8 / M10)
Hiroaki Takahashi (M4)
Kensuke Inage (M2 / M3)

Arrange:
Yojiro Yoshimatsu (M1 / M12 / M13)
Junya Ishiguro (M2 / M5 / M6 / M9 / M11)
Kosuke Mizukami (M3 / M4 / M7 / M8 / M10)

Sound Director: Yojiro Yoshimatsu
Shakuhachi, Musical Supervisor: Gazan Watanabe
Tsugaru-Shamisen: Katsunari Sawada
Shinobue, Nohkan: Kan Fukuhara
Recording Studio: Koei Tecmo Studio
Mastering Engineer: Koji Tanaka
Mastering Studio: JVC Mastering Center
info:
• 别名: Samurai Warriors 4-II Original Soundtrack
  • 发售日期: 2015-02-11
  • 价格: 12744円
  • 播放时长: 41:49
  • 碟片数量: 1
